Welcome!

Petals Flowers & Home is a privately owned business. We sell flower arrangements, home decor, beard oil, and an assortment of clothing and accessories. We decorate for all seasons, birthdays, events, etc. We are owned and managed by Renee Roberts. Click Here to meet Renee. Please contact us for inquiries!
